00039                              Definitions section
00040  ******************************************************************************/
00041 #define APS_AIB_NONMEMBER_RADIUS_DEFAULT_VALUE 2
00042 
00045 #define APS_NO_SEC_CMD_NO_KEY      (1U << 0)
00046 
00048 #define APS_NO_SEC_CMD_GLOBAL_KEY  (1U << 1)
00049 
00051 #define APS_NO_SEC_CMD_UNIQUE_KEY  (1U << 2)
00052 
00054 #define APS_SEC_CMD_GLOBAL_KEY     (1U << 3)
00055 
00057 #define APS_SEC_CMD_UNIQUE_KEY     (1U << 4)
00058 
00059 #define APS_ENCRYPT_OUT_CMD_BY_GLOBAL_KEY  (1U << 5)
00060 
00061 #define APS_ENCRYPT_OUT_CMD_BY_UNIQUE_KEY  (1U << 6)
00062 
00063 #define APS_IS_DUP_CMD_REQUIRED  (1U << 7)
00064 
00065 #define APS_ENCRYPT_OUT_CMD \
00066   (APS_ENCRYPT_OUT_CMD_BY_GLOBAL_KEY | APS_ENCRYPT_OUT_CMD_BY_UNIQUE_KEY)
00067

00071 
00076 typedef uint8_t APS_SecurityPolicy_t;
00077 
00078 
00083 typedef struct _APS_TCSecurityPolicy_t
00084 {
00085   struct PACK
00086   {
00087     LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(7, (
00088     uint8_t allowJoins : 1,
00089     uint8_t allowRejoins : 1,
00090     uint8_t useWhiteList : 1,
00091     uint8_t updateTCLKRequired : 1,
00092     uint8_t allowRemoteTCPolicyChange : 1,
00093     uint8_t allowInstallCodes : 1,
00094     uint8_t reserved : 2
00095     ))
00096   }flags;
00097 
00098   /* Other TC security policies will be brought in, soon */
00099 }APS_TCSecurityPolicy_t;
00100

00123 #endif //#if defined _TRUST_CENTRE_
00124 #endif /* _LINK_SECURITY_ */
